sentence.Network_en: The United Nations Security Council took sanctions against the aggressor country.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国安理会对侵略国采取了制裁措施.

sentence.Network_en: The aggressor troops are not many degrees removed from the brute.
sentence.Network_cn: 侵略军简直象一群野兽.

sentence.Network_en: A succession of military defeats weakened the aggressor.
sentence.Network_cn: 一连串的军事失败削弱了侵略者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《牛津英汉词典》全集完整版TXT电子书 - 豆丁网 ... aggressive adj. 侵略的，进取的 aggressor n. 侵略者 agitate v. 鼓动.
英语专四词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... aftermath n. （不幸事件的）后果 aggressor n. 侵略者，攻击者 agony n. 苦恼，极大的痛苦.
首页 ... be aggravated with sb. 生某人的气 aggressor  n. 攻击者, 侵略者, 侵略国 n. 攻击; 侵略, 侵犯, 侵害.
通过阅读理解提高单词量 - 豆丁网 ... provocation n． 挑衅 aggressor n． 侵犯者；挑衅者 react vi． 作出反应.

list.abs: agent net 谍报网aggressor forces 侵略军；假设敌air 空炸

when I was young , I already knew about your country . at that time it was called Abyssinia , and its people were courageously waging a just war against the Italian Fascist aggressors .我在青年时代就知道你们的国家，当时叫阿比西尼亚，进行了英勇的抗击意大利法西斯侵略者的正义战争
The Chinese people had crushed the Japanese aggressors in the Anti - Japanese War ., 在抗日战争中 , 中国人民打垮了日本侵略者.

in 1885 , foreign aggressors put up a signboard at the entrance a park in the French concession a blatant insult to the Chinesepeople , it read , " Chinese and dogs not admitted . "1885年，外国侵略者甚至在上海法租界公园门口公然竖起“华人与狗不得入内”的牌子，肆无忌惮地侮辱中国人的人格。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin, from aggredi 'to attack' (see aggression)

entry.def: The aggressor in a fight or battle is the person, group, or country that starts it.

example.ex: They have been the aggressors in this conflict.
example.tran: 他们一直是这次冲突中的挑衅方。

means.word_mean: 2. a confident assertive person who acts as instigator

auth_sentence.content: People knew that we would not tolerate an aggressor.
auth_sentence.res_content: People knew that we would not tolerate an aggressor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People knew that we would not tolerate an aggressor.

auth_sentence.content: To continue the fight against the aggressor nations.
auth_sentence.res_content: To continue the fight against the aggressor nations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To continue the fight against the aggressor nations.

auth_sentence.content: It's seen as a past aggressor and a potential future aggressor.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's seen as a past aggressor and a potential future aggressor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's seen as a past aggressor and a potential future aggressor.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

sentences.en: A succession of military defeats weakened the aggressor.
sentences.cn: 一连串的军事失败削弱了侵略者。

sentences.en: The treaty was to the aggressor’s advantage.
The chief aggressors were Germany, Japan and Italy in World War Ⅱ.
sentences.cn: 二次世界大战中的主要侵略者是德国、日本和意大利。

sentences.en: The aggressor troops marched into the neighbouring country on the pretext of searching for their missing soldier.
sentences.cn: 侵略军开进一个邻国,借口寻找他们失踪的士兵。
